channel.title: Research on instantiator.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Research on instantiator.dev

item.title: Dead Person Switches - secrets from beyond the grave
item.description: More commonly known as a Dead Man’s Switch, a Dead Person Switch (DPS) is a system that can hold a secret on behalf of a person, and govern its release should they become unavailable.

item.title: Dead Person Switches - appeal for journalists
item.description: I am hoping to interview some investigative journalists for my masters thesis at the University of Oxford.

item.title: A template thesis to simplify your write-up
item.description: The things I’ll do to avoid learning LaTeX… Do you prefer Markdown to LaTeX?

item.title: We're only human
item.description: Cleaning up data from volunteer groups across the UK. We’re only human In the previous post, we took a tour of the open data available that tells the story of volunteerism across the UK since the coronavirus crisis began.

item.title: Look for the helpers
item.description: What can we learn about grass-roots COVID-19 volunteer groups from open data?
